title: Two-Bedroom Penthouse in Hunters Point
posting_body: ['Stellar Duplex Penthouse Condo with private outdoor space and the best view in Hunters Point!', 'Enjoy luxury living in this beautiful sprawling 2 Bedroom 3 Bath condo with soaring ceilings and a stylish convenient layout.', 'The first level features an expansive living room that is flooded with gorgeous natural light.', 'The living room opens to a tremendous private terrace, well-appointed for quiet contemplation or entertaining in style.', 'The panoramic views will inspire you.', 'This is living well in the greatest city in the world!', 'The modern open kitchen is fit for a budding Paul Bocuse; outfitted with high-end stainless steel appliances and set up nicely with an emphasis on both form and function.', 'With a Viking stove, Italian granite countertops and quality triple lacquered cabinetry, all that is needed is your ingenuity and a few kitchen accoutrements to create the perfect meal to pair with your housewarming party!', 'The bedrooms are on the second floor and each is ideally configured.', 'The spacious primary bedroom has great closet space, along with extra storage.', 'The en-suite bathroom has Italian marble, a double sink, a deep soaking tub and a separate shower.', 'The second bedroom features a private balcony to start the day with some fresh air and that phenomenal view!', 'This bedroom also has an en-suite bathroom.', '*Two bicycle spots are included in the rent, along with access to all of the fabulous amenities!', 'The View at East Coast is a luxury building, designed by Handel Architects, on Gantry Plaza State Park.', 'It is the only waterfront condominium building in Long Island City.', 'This 24-hour doorman building has everything covered.', 'Residents have access to a staggering array of the finest amenities, including an indoor swimming pool, billiards room, fitness center, spa, cinema, yoga room and lounges.', 'Plus, the super fast commute from here to Manhattan or Brooklyn is a breeze.', 'The convenient public transportation options include the NYC Ferry and the E/M/G/7.', 'The building is in close proximity to a range of exceptional restaurants, nightlife and culture.', 'Long Island City has some of the best contemporary art destinations the city has to offer, including MoMA PS1!']
